doc:
Charles Martinet https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Martinet 0 Charles Andre Martinet (; French: [maʁtinɛ]; born September 17, 1955) is an American actor and voice actor. He is best known for voicing Mario in the Super Mario video game series. Martinet has voiced this title character of Nintendo's flagship video game franchise since 1990, and he also voices related characters such as Baby Mario, Luigi, Baby Luigi, Wario, Waluigi, and Toadsworth. Charles_Andre_Martinet ( ; French : [_maʁtinɛ_] ; born September_17_,_1955 ) is an_American_actor_and_voice_actor . He is_best_known for voicing_Mario in the_Super_Mario_video_game_series . Martinet has_voiced this_title_character of Nintendo 's_flagship_video_game_franchise since 1990 , and he also voices related_characters such_as Baby_Mario , Luigi , Baby_Luigi , Wario , Waluigi , and Toadsworth .
